name: Thawed
description:
The controls are mentioned in the game, but here they are anyway:

Arrow keys to move

Get into the hole to win

Stay in the blue area

The ball will roll until it hits a wall

Pick up fire objects to thaw locked blocks

Other blocks also have specific behaviors

Press R the restart if you get softlocked

Most of the graphics are from Kenney.nl

At the moment, there are a lot of issues that I have yet to resolve:

Help button does not usually work

The ball sometimes rolls around randomly

The 2-ball levels are glitchy

Please comment if you have any suggestions or find more issues!
